metadata.job_title: Sr. Data Engineer(hands on Palantir exp.)

seniority_level.evidence: Title contains 'Sr.' and requires 8-10 years experience, which perfectly matches senior level expectations

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and job description focuses on data engineering responsibilities

sub_specialty.evidence: Palantir Foundry and Hadoop ecosystem suggest general data engineering with enterprise platform focus

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of mentoring, team leadership, or direct reports - purely hands-on technical role

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud provider mentioned, only Hadoop-based technologies which can be on-prem or cloud-agnostic

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all in the job description

processing_paradigm.evidence: Hadoop, Hive, and PySpark are typically used for batch processing workflows, no streaming technologies mentioned

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools like Airflow, Spark workflows, or other scheduling systems mentioned

storage_layer.evidence: Hadoop ecosystem with Hive suggests data lake architecture patterns rather than modern cloud warehouses

remote_restriction.evidence: Specifically requires 'locals only for onsite' work in Atlanta, GA area

timezone_focus.evidence: Atlanta, GA location implies Eastern Time Zone, but focus is on US residency requirement

relocation_required.evidence: Looking for locals only - requires candidate to already be in Atlanta area, no relocation package mentioned

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and locals-only requirement suggests preference for existing work authorization

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Looking for locals only and independent contractor status suggests no student visa support

citizenship_required.evidence: Must be authorized to work in US (implied by locals requirement) but no specific citizenship requirement stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is contract and specifically mentions 'independent candidate' suggesting corp-to-corp arrangement

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or other compensation details mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No discussion of career growth, advancement opportunities, or professional development mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of working with senior staff, mentorship programs, or collaborative learning environment

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion opportunities, advancement paths, or career progression

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or exploring different positions within company

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, promotion ladders, or advancement paths mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Very specific technical requirements (Palantir Foundry, 8-10 years experience) with no flexibility mentioned

scope_definition.evidence: Focused specifically on senior data engineering role with clear technical requirements and responsibilities

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 8-10 years experience for senior level with specific technical skills is reasonable and not inflated
